title: Walmart | SDE III (Android) | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech in non-CS
Years of Experience: 2 Years and 10 months
Prior Experience: Bank
Current comp: Rs 16LPA Fixed
Date of the Offer: May 2024
Company: Walmart Global Tech India
Title/Level: SDE-III
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: Rs 18LPA (base) + 86,400 (PF) = Rs. 18.86 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: No signing bonus, standard relocation
Stock bonus: Rs 4.5LPA (quarterly vested in 3 years)
Bonus: Rs 3.6LPA
Total comp for 1st year (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 18.86(base) + 3.6(Bonus) + 4.5/3(RSU) = **Rs 23.96 LPA**
Benefits: Standard benefits

I do not have any other offer at hand. Should I accept it? HR not ready to negotiate at all.
Can I reject an offer after accepting it in case i get a better offer during my notice period?
